Post_body: I found two old newspapers in my room

Commenti.Body: I have both. I think the second one is worth something to these days. Not too much, but something.
You're missing the one after the Coppa Italia win
tear out the first page, buy a frame and make a picture out of it!
I liked Steven, but Moratti was bleeding black and blue for real

[**Here's**](https://telegrafi.com/en/moratti-kam-pritur-fjale-me-te-keqija-nga-tifozet/) an **old** article, from when the ultras criticized him. He said, "It was intelligent & justified. If it had been me, I'd have written worse."

Class act through & through. 

Fun Fact : One of the questions/ criticism was why the players think of him like a father (then leave the club to win elsewhere). Ronaldo, Adri, Recoba, JZ4 etc. all *loved* him.
The scudetto one is from 2007, not from Triplete season
Its not even a comparison mate
Moratti straight up kept pulling cash out of his pocket to strengthen the club. He put his life's work into our colors. A legend!

Nobody thinks he was good with his investments. They were all over the place, very often on absurd whims. And as much love and passion he injected into the team, he was also a heavy enabler. And all players but a very few get attached to the colors as he is. A career is a career. He gave too much. 

Either way. He's a legend. And so is Bedy tbh. ðŸ™Œ
Ah, my bad!! I didn't recognise it at first, indeed... but I thought it was just bad memory
